title: The Los Angeles Lakers say they expect Anthony Davis to be sidelined at least a week after he suffered an abdominal strain | | northwestgeorgianews.com
text:
The Los Angeles Lakers say they expect Anthony Davis to be sidelined at least a week after he suffered an abdominal strain
- Jared C. Tilton
- Updated
0
Tags
As featured on
Los Angeles Lakers star Anthony Davis is expected to miss at least a week after suffering an abdominal muscle strain, the NBA team said Wednesday.
